title: The Owner would also be compensated for all infrastructure developed by him that is not attributable to infrastructure pertaining to Owner’s share of land and construction of the AH tenements & OA as described below
clause_text: The Owner would also be compensated for all infrastructure developed by him that is not attributable to infrastructure pertaining to Owner’s share of land and construction of the AH tenements & OA as described below.
